title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 5330.4 - Vendor licensing
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 5330.4 - Vendor licensing

State Regulations

Entities offering goods and services that directly relate
to gaming activity with a mobile sports wagering licensee, including, without
limitation, manufacturers, suppliers, software providers and repair companies, shall submit a mobile sports wagering vendor license application. Each mobile
sports wagering vendor shall be licensed as such according to the standards
equivalent to those set forth for casino vendor enterprises in Racing

PariMutuel Wagering and Breeding Law section 1326 and Parts 5303 and 5307 of
this subchapter. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
5330.4

Adopted

New

York State Register November 24, 2021/Volume XLIII, Issue 47, eff. 11/24/2021

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
